home.presentation_name: Hi ðŸ‘‹! My name is Benjamin Bouillot, a french web developer at Grenoble, France.
home.presentation_other: Here there are my different professional experiences, and some personal projects.
home.presentation_final: Development is my passion since years, that why I have a Master's Degree in Development and Management (MIAGE) at UGA in 2020.
home.presentation_cv: You can download my resume (french version only):

enalean_1021_present.title: Web Developer Engineer
enalean_1021_present.content_1: I'm a front and back developer. I integrate models on front of Tuleap (with Vue.Js + TypeScript), I maintain and upgrade the REST API (PHP). I create some tests too, like unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests and validation tests.
enalean_1021_present.content_2: During this period, I work on an integration of GitLab in Tuleap. This integrations allorw to reference a Tuleap's artifact/issue in GitLab commit or GitLab Merge Request.
enalean_1021_present.content_2_link_begin: You can see this integration on this video {0}.
enalean_1021_present.content_3: Languages: PHP, Vue.Js, TypeScript/JavaScript, PHPUnit, Jest, Mock, Cypress
enalean_1021_present.content_4: Tools: NPM, Docker, Gerrit, Jenkins, Nix, Webpack

enalean_intership_master.title: Work-Study program (1 year) - Create widget to improve Tuleap dashboard
enalean_intership_master.summary: This widget, named Project Milestones, resume all Milestones in development with design highlighting KPIs of agile method: Scrum (like Remaining Effort, Remaining Time, Initial Effort, Sprints, ...) and improve decision making of Product Owners or managers. I created 2 graphs (BurnDown and BurnUp) with D3.js.
enalean_intership_master.technique: It has been developed with Vue.Js and PHP. During this year, I had another mission that was to integrate and use TypeScript in Tuleap instead of JavaScript. And I improved some API REST routes
enalean_intership_master.source_code_link_begin: {0} you will find widget's source code.
enalean_intership_master.languages: Languages used: PHP, Vue.Js, TypeScript, D3.js, PHPUnit, Jest, Cypress
enalean_intership_master.tools: Tools used : NPM, Docker, Gerrit, Jenkins, Webpack, MÃ©thodologie Scrum (Code review, Pair Programming, ...)

enalean_intership_licence.title: Internship (3 months) - Development of an automation allowing the synchronization of 2 instances of Tuleap
enalean_intership_licence.summary: This internship's goal was to demonstrate the possibility of synchronize 2 Tuleap's instances automatically. For example, replication of issues/artifacts from one instance to another automatically.
enalean_intership_licence.technique: This automaton was has been developed with PHP. When an issue/artifact is created or updated in one Tuleap's instance, then a webhook is called in another Tuleap's instance with a payload containing all necessary informations, afterward a XML file is automatically generated with these informations and it is imported in the Tuleap's instance to replicate the issue/artifact.
enalean_intership_licence.tools: Tools used : NPM, Docker, Gerrit, Jenkins, Webpack, MÃ©thodologie Scrum (Code review, Pair Programming, ...)

other_experiences.title: Others works experiences (1 year)
other_experiences.summary: When I got my High school Degree, I worked during 1 year before continue my studies. For example I worked like cleaner, grapes picker, dock agent...
